name: Last Day on Wasteland
description:
Welcome to the Wasteland! It became worse and worse since the war began. There is neither communication nor trust in the world. Clashes broke out among everybody.

Play as a Hero, complete challenging missions, earn rewards, challenge & duel to take out bandits and enjoy the savage destruction of this wasteland.

Main Features

• Car battles
• Destruction derbies and races
• Explosive mines
• Third-person shooter
• Fearless attacks on thug enemies
